QAData.question: Who won between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Brighton & Hove Albion on Sat, 30 Apr 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 3–0 over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sat, 30 Apr 2022 14:00:00 GMT.
